name: F**k Trains
description:
Created for the Global Game Jam 2021, theme: "Lost & Found".

Old playthings long lost and forgotten by their owners clash to find a new purpose in their existence...

Controls ActionGamepadMouse + KeyboardWalkLeft ThumbstickWASDLook AroundRight ThumbstickMouseJumpA ButtonSpacebarShootRight Trigger (RT)Left Mouse ClickLock OnRight Shoulder (RB)Right Mouse ClickPauseStart ButtonEscape Credits
